component.name: Siproxylin
component.summary: Privacy-focused XMPP client with per-account proxy support

description.p: Siproxylin is a modern, privacy-focused XMPP (Jabber) desktop client for Linux. Built with privacy in mind, it supports per-account HTTP/SOCKS5 proxies and enforced call relaying to protect your identity.

ul.li: Per-account HTTP/SOCKS5 proxy support (Tor, VPN, custom proxies)
Enforced call relaying for IP address protection
Multi-language spell checking (en, de, ru, lt, es, ro, ar)

screenshot.caption: Main chat window with OMEMO encryption

description.p: Development build with AppImage packaging and multi-language support
